Jacket ニードルス NIKE AIR JORDAN 1 RETRO HIGH OG ROKX ロックス ショーツ ショートパンツ チェック柄 お支払いについて お支払いは以下の方法がご利用いただけます。 送料・配送について 送料は商品によって異なります。 自社発送便（当店から発送）とメーカー直送便（メーカーから直接お届け）のいずれかが商品ごとに設定されております。それぞれ特徴や制約がございますので、ご確認の上、ご注文下さい。 当店ではエコの観点から最低限の簡易梱包とし、原則納品書も同封致しませんので予めご了承ください。 返品・交換について お客様都合による返品・交換 当店ではお客様都合による返品・交換は受け付けておりません。 商品等の不具合による返品・交換 商品到着後7日以内に弊社までメールもしくは電話にてご連絡ください。それを過ぎますと、返品・交換のご要望はお受けできなくなります。メーカー確認の都合上、ご使用環境や、不良箇所の写真を確認させていただく場合がございます。また、メーカーより直接ご対応させていただく場合がございます。 個人情報について お客様からお預かりした個人情報は、商品発送業務以外には一切使用いたしません。当社が責任をもって安全に保管し、第三者に譲渡・提供することはございません。 メールによる連絡業務は、楽天のシステム上から安全に行われます。 営業時間について お客様窓口営業時間： 平日: 9:00~18:00 休日: 土・日・祝日 xddpnkw@familiarstep.top メールでのお問い合わせは24時間受付けております。 48時間以内（休業日を除く）にて返信いたします。 Copyright © 2024 千足義貴

thought: The text extracted contains several red flags that align with typical scam website characteristics: unusually low prices, various products categories similar to common e-commerce websites, and a contact email address that does not seem appropriate for business use. Additionally, the copyright year is set to 2024, which is a future date and could indicate that the information listed has not been updated appropriately.
The WHOIS retrieval failed, which could indicate a problem with the WHOIS service or the domain itself. However, I still need more information to determine if the site is a scam.

[{'url': 'https://malwaretips.com/blogs/jetery-shop/', 'content': "Reviews seem fake or non-existent. Scam sites don't have much satisfied customer proof. Limited or vague return policy information. Check independent review sites first before buying through an unknown seller advertising on Instagram."}, {'url': 'https://www.scamadviser.com/check-website/jetoffer.shop', 'content': 'jetoffer.shop is probably legit as the trust score is reasonable. Our Scamadviser algorithm reviewed jetoffer.shop with a score of 80. The trust score is based on 40 different data points we collected. From if contact details are hidden, to other websites located on the same server, the reviews we found across the internet, etcetera.'}, {'url': 'https://www.reddit.com/r/Scams/comments/pgaiie/bought_a_jersey_from_this_website_am_i_being/', 'content': "Looks pretty sketchy to me. The 'About Us' is meaningless 'happy words' that actually tell you nothing about the company. The bottom of the page that appears regularly says 'Follow Steelers Pro Shop' and has social media links that merely go to the home page for each service.. Although if this is a scam site, I'm surprised they've hung around for 4 years (based on Whois and Wayback Machine)."}, {'url': 'https://www.reddit.com/r/CampingandHiking/comments/189biei/anyone_order_from_here_before_is_it_legit/', 'content': "Luckily bank did a chargeback. But that's not always the case. Do not order from it, if you ordered do not accept package and fill a chargeback ASAP. ya I'm gonna say fake. their domain is from namecheap and Black Friday had a sale for .shop domains were $0.38 for a year. .shop is almost always a scam."}, {'url': 'https://www.paypal-community.com/t5/Disputes-and-Limitations/I-accidentally-purchased-tools-from-a-scam-website-How-do-I/td-p/2096040', 'content': "I get an error when I try to use the resolution center to report a problem:
We’re sorry, you can’t file a case on this type of transaction. There was a running shoe store with 40% off... a bit more realistic sale and I was about to make a purchase but then I realized it was the same scam. The fellow is a known scammer and I have forwarded paypal info proving that yet they seem to continue to enable him?
Haven't Found your Answer?
 I guess I'll have to start calling and get used to being on hold, if I can get through to someone.
 So I have been disputing this w/ paypal for about 3 weeks now and they keep moving the expected resolution dates up and up.
Is this normal for Paypal?"}]

The mention of a domain sale and the use of .shop domains often being associated with scams is also concerning.

thought: The certificate information shows that the website's SSL certificate is valid and issued by a known Certificate Authority (Let's Encrypt). This suggests that while the site has a valid SSL certificate, this alone is not enough to determine its legitimacy.

The DNS record for jetoffer.shop contains a HINFO record with "RFC8482", which is not a standard DNS record for typical website operations. This may indicate that the DNS configuration is not typical for a legitimate e-commerce site. Based on the observations, there are several indicators that suggest the website might be a scam, including several of the characteristics outlined in the initial instructions. I now know the final answer. The URL https://bxqnms.jetoffer.shop/ appears to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The site exhibits multiple characteristics of a scam website including unusually low prices handling a wide range of product categories similar to common e-commerce sites an inappropriate business contact email address a copyright year set to a future date suggesting outdated information conflicting information from search results indicating potential scam activity and an unusual DNS record.
